publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3323.1 Christine Grahame: Children of Asylum Seekers—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3323) in the name of Patrick Harvie, insert at end “and, separately, calls on the UK Government to give due regard to the different child protection measures in Scotland, in particular the remit of the Commissioner for Children and Young People and the jurisdiction of the Reporter to the Children’s Panel.”
